CodeList.Name: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: HADS01-I Feel Tense or Wound Up
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I feel tense or 'wound up.'
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - I Feel Tense or Wound Up

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: HADS01-Enjoy the Things I Used to Enjoy
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I still enjoy the things I used to enjoy.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - I Still Enjoy the Things I Used to Enjoy

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I get a sort of frightened feeling as if something awful is about to happen.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - I Get a Frightened Feeling Something Awful is About to Happen

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: HADS01-I Can Laugh and See Funny Side
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I can laugh and see the funny side of things.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - I Can Laugh and See Funny Side of Things

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - Worrying thoughts go through my mind.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - Worrying Thoughts Go Through My Mind

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I feel cheerful.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: HADS01-Sit at Ease and Feel Relaxed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I can sit at ease and feel relaxed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - I Can Sit at Ease and Feel Relaxed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: HADS01-I Feel as if I am Slowed Down
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I feel as if I am slowed down.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - I Feel as if I am Slowed Down

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I get a sort of frightened feeling like 'butterflies' in the stomach.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - I Get Frightened Feeling Like Butterflies in the Stomach

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I have lost interest in my appearance.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - I Have Lost Interest in My Appearance

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: HADS01-Feel Restless be on the Move
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I feel restless as if I have to be on the move.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - I Feel Restless as if I Have to be on the Move

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I look forward with enjoyment to things.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - I Look Forward with Enjoyment to Things

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: HADS01-I Get Sudden Feelings of Panic
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I get sudden feelings of panic.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - I Get Sudden Feelings of Panic

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - I can enjoy a good book or radio or television programme.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: HADS - I Can Enjoy a Good Book or Radio or Television Programme

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - Total score anxiety.
Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale - Total score depression.

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire HADS Test Code Terminology
